heading: Tonight
text: Scattered to numerous snow showers north and mountains. Partly cloudy east.

heading: Friday
text: Blustery. Snow showers likely north, scattered south.
temperature: Upper 20s to upper 30s, north to south

heading: Saturday
text: Early snow showers northeast ending. Becoming sunny south, increasing afternoon sun north.

heading: Sunday
text: Periods of light snow or valley rain spreading east.
